reason: UNDEFINED NOTATION B₀ ∪ {∗}: The statement claims 'H_6 is isomorphic to S_4 via the action on B₀ ∪ {∗}'. The symbol ∗ is not defined. If B₀ = {{1,4}, {2,5}, {3,6}} has 3 blocks, then B₀ ∪ {∗} would have 4 elements only if ∗ is a single new element. This would give an action on 4 points, consistent with S_4, but the construction needs explicit definition. What is ∗?
